transcript: set expectations meet expectations set expectations meet expectations and the more expectations you can set and then meet the more they will trust you and so like if you can take a big outcome like selling a house that's one outcome and just say I'm going to sell it for you it's really hard to develop loops around trust but if I say there's about 37 steps that it takes to sell the house and this is what's going to happen in each step and after the first three steps happen even if it's a couple days and each one I just I keep you in the loop you're going to trust me a lot more and so I'm a big believer and like
